315312.「よく 来てくれた。では……さっそく\n おまえたちに ドラゴラムを 伝授しよう:
Thank you for coming. Now... let's get to work
on your Puff. First, Aspa... this way.

315314.「あれれ？ なんだか 不思議な感覚がしますっ！: What is it? I have a strange feeling!

315315.「おまえは たった今 ゾーンに入った。\n これで ドラゴラムが\n 使えるよう:
You have just entered the zone. Now you can
use Puff. Try it out.

315318.「竜化って こんなもんかよ。\n さぞかし 強大な竜に なれるものだと\n 思っ:
I didn't know dragonification could be like
this. I thought I'd become a mighty dragon.

315319.「ドラゴラムは 自身に眠る 潜在的なチカラと\n 竜のチカラが結合して 竜化する:
Puff is a technique that combines the latent power of the dragon with the latent power of the self to transform into a dragon... in its
own unique form.

315320.「それなら ひと安心だ。\n こんな ちんちくりんになるのは\n ごめんだぜ。:
Well, that's a relief. I'd hate to become such
a little runt.

315321.「失礼ですね！\n 僕は こう見えテ 強イですよっ！: That's rude! I look like this, but I'm strong!

315322.「そうダ……ボクは ツヨイ……このチカラ\n ミセテヤルウウゥゥゥッッッ……！！:
That's right...I'm TsuYoi...I'm going to make
this power work...!

315324.「アスパ……！ しっかりしろ！\n チカラに 取り込まれるな！:
Aspa...! Stay with me! Don't let it take you
away!

315326.「ああ そうだ。\n 最強の魔法使いに なるんだろう？\n そのおまえが チカラ:
Yeah, that's right. You're going to be the
best mage, aren't you? What are you going to
do when you're consumed by power?

315330.「師匠 すみません……。\n 僕……急に 頭が真っ白になって……。:
Master, I'm sorry... My mind suddenly went
blank...

315331.「おまえは 竜のチカラに 打ち勝った。\n もう 大丈夫だ。:
You have conquered the power of the dragon.
It's all right now.

315332.「……ったく 人騒がせなヤツだな。\n さあ 俺にも ドラゴラムを伝授してくれ。:
You're a very disturbing guy, aren't you? Come
on, teach me Puff.

315335.「……ついに やった！\n 俺は やったぞ……ハハハハハハハッ！！: I finally did it! I did it...hahahahahahahaha!

315337.「ルーイン まさか おまえも……。: Ruine, don't tell me you are too...

315338.「勘違いするな。\n 俺は こいつのチカラになんざ\n 取り込まれちゃいないぜ。:
Don't get me wrong. I'm not in the power of
this guy.

315339.「俺は ずっと この時を待ってたんだ……\n この奥義を 習得する時をな！:
I've been waiting for this moment... to master
this art!

315340.「バウギス……覚悟しろ。\n おまえのチカラで おまえの息の根を\n 止めてやる:
Baugis...get ready. I'll use your power to
choke the life out of you!

315343.「<cs_pchero>！ 受け取れ……！\n おまえも ドラゴラムで竜化して\:
<cs_pchero>! Take it..! You too must
dragonize with Puff to stop Ruine!

315344.<cs_pchero>は ゾーンに入り\nドラゴラムを使ってみた！: <cs_pchero> entered the zone and used Puff!

315346.「ルーインさん どうして こんなことを……。: Ruine, why are you doing this...

315347.「……ハッ。どうしても何も 俺が\n 竜術士なんかになったのは バウギスを殺して:
Ha...ha. I became a Dragomancer so that I
could kill Baugis and exterminate
Dragomancers.

315349.「……俺の姉さんは 竜術士だったんだ。\n それが こいつらのせいで ドラゴラム:
My sister was a Dragomancer. She lost her
life during Puff because of these guys. This
is my revenge!

315351.「謝って 許されることではないが\n 彼女のことは 本当に すまなかった……。:
I know it's not something I can apologize for,
but I'm really sorry about her...

315352.「黙れっ……！ あんたは 姉さんを\n 死なせたっていうのに いまだに 性こりも:
Shut up..! You let my sister die, and yet
you're still teaching me these tricks without
a care in the world!

315353.「身寄りのない俺たちは 孤児院暮らしで\n 俺が信用できるのは 姉さんだけだった:
We lived in orphanage and the only person I
could trust was my sister... You were the only
family I had!

315354.「姉さんは 海が好きだった……。\n それなのに どうして 海を離れて\n こん:
My sister loved the sea... So why did you
leave the sea to become a Dragomancer in a
land of nothingness...?

315355.「……ルーイン。\n おまえは 虚竜に 見覚えがあるのではないか？:
Ruine, don't you recognize the imaginary
dragon?

315356.「……だったら なんだっていうんだよ。: What do you mean if that's the case?

315357.「幼い頃……おまえとシーロアは ご両親を探しに\n オーグリード大陸に 来たこと:
As a child... you and Shiroa must have come to
Ogreed looking for your parents.

315358.「ああ……冒険者だった両親は 俺たちを預けて\n オーグリード大陸に 渡ったと:
Oh...I once went looking for my parents, who
were adventurers, after an orphanage teacher
told me they had left us in Ogreed.

315359.「結局 何も 手がかりを\n 得られなかったうえに 魔物に襲われて\n さんざん:
In the end, we got no leads and were attacked
by a monster, with mixed results...

315360.「……そうだ！ あの虚竜というバケモノ\n どこかで見覚えがあると 思っていたが:
That's right! I thought I've seen that monster called "the imaginary dragon" somewhere before, but it turned out to be the monster
from that time...!

315361.「まさか……あそこで 俺たちを\n 助けてくれたのは あんただったのか……！？:
Don't tell me... it was you who saved us back
there...!

315362.「……ああ そうだ。あの日……バウギスが\n 邪悪な気配を感じ取り 調査に向かっ:
Yes, that's right. That day... when Baugis
sensed the presence of evil and went to
investigate, that's when I met you guys.

315363.「シーロアは 私たちの事情を知ると\n 自分も協力すると 申し出てくれた。:
When Shiroa learned of our situation, he
offered to help.

315364.「そこで 私は 長年の研究の成果である\n 契約による方法で バウギスのチカラを:
So I gave Baugis power and made her a
Dragomancer through contractual means, the
result of many years of research.

315365.「しかし 結果として\n そのせいで 彼女を死なせてしまった……。: But as it turns out, it caused her death...

315366.「竜術士なんてものは 所詮 呪われた職業だ。\n こんな道を 歩むのは\n やは:
Dragomancers are only a cursed vocation. I
thought that I alone was enough to walk this
path...

315367.「だが……シーロアは 亡くなる直前に\n 私に 言ったんだ。:
But...Shiroa told me just before she passed
away.

315368.「自分が死んでも 竜術士の道を閉ざすことなく\n ひとりでも多くの 竜術士を\n:
I hope that even after my death, I will not close the path of Dragomancers and that as many Dragomancers as possible will be born in
the world.

315369.「ルーインさん……。\n その……なんて言ったら いいか……。: Ruine... I don't know what to say...

315370.「……姉さんは 試験の時 なんて……？: What did you say when you took the test?

315372.「姉さんは……入門試験の 最後の問いに\n なんと 答えたんだ？:
How did you answer the last question on the
introductory exam?

315376.「……彼が まさか バウギスの命を奪うために\n 竜術士になったとは……。竜術士:
I never thought he became a Dragomancer to
take the life of Baugis... Dragomancers are a
cursed vocation.

315377.「私の命を差し出して 彼の気が晴れるなら\n いくらでも そうしてやりたいが……:
If I could offer my life to make him feel
better, I would...but that would be going
against Shiroa's wishes.

315378.「……<cs_pchero>。\n ルーインを止めてくれて ありがとう。\n 感:
...<cs_pchero>. thanks for stopping Ruine. I
appreciate it.

315379.「これで おまえは ゾーン技であるドラゴラムを\n 習得した。くれぐれも 竜のチ:
Now you have mastered the Pep Power, Puff. Do
not be swallowed by the power of the dragon.

315380.「これは 礼だ。受け取ってくれ。: This is a courtesy. Take it.

315381.「虚竜王との 決戦の日は近い……。\n 来たるべき日に 備えて\n 修行を 積ん:
The day of the decisive battle against the
false Dragonlord is near... Please train
yourself for the coming day.
